医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新机器学习模型在心脏病预测方面取得突破，准确率超过95%基于机器学习的心脏病预测模型 (ML-HDPM)，使用各种信息组合和众多公认的分类方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/New-machine-learning-model-achieves-breakthrough-in-heart-disease-prediction-with-over-9525-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/New-machine-learning-model-achieves-breakthrough-in-heart-disease-prediction-with-over-9525-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=902df861-5e59-4235-b583-0661a4f81c3e Fri, 05 Apr 2024 07:31:00 -0400 New machine learning model achieves breakthrough in heart disease prediction with over 95% accuracy

更多的孩子死于吸毒过量。儿科医生可以提供更多帮助吗？在马萨诸塞州阿克斯布里奇的三河家庭健康中心，一名金发蓬乱的 17 岁男孩走上了体重秤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/More-kids-are-dying-of-drug-overdoses-Could-pediatricians-do-more-to-help.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/More-kids-are-dying-of-drug-overdoses-Could-pediatricians-do-more-to-help.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1eceffe6-523c-4546-8244-81f0b0c4a928 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 06:46:07 -0400 More kids are dying of drug overdoses. Could pediatricians do more to help?
饮食选择与拉丁裔先兆子痫发病率较高有关一项新的研究表明，对于怀孕的拉丁裔美国人来说，食物选择可以降低先兆子痫（一种危险的高血压）的风险，并且基于文化食物偏好而不是美国政府基准的饮食更有可能有助于预防这种疾病显示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Dietary-choices-are-linked-to-higher-rates-of-preeclampsia-among-Latinas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Dietary-choices-are-linked-to-higher-rates-of-preeclampsia-among-Latinas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0798daaf-6cec-4216-bdb7-0dac4a991848 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 06:43:30 -0400 Dietary choices are linked to higher rates of preeclampsia among Latinas
新研究发现干扰素-γ释放测定比皮试更有效地预测结核病结核菌素皮试（TST）和干扰素-γ释放测定（IGRA）在预测结核病（TB）中的表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/New-study-finds-interferon-ceb3-release-assays-more- effective-than-skin-tests-in-predicting-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/New-study-finds-interferon-ceb3-release-assays-more- effective-than-skin-tests-in-predicting-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f0e92a3-aa48-430d-bbb9-788b4045b665 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 05:57:00 -0400 New study finds interferon-γ release assays more effective than skin tests in predicting tuberculosis
感觉孤独？新研究表明，它可能会影响你的大脑对食物的反应个人感知的社会孤立程度与与食物线索相关的大脑模式之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Feeling-lonely-It-may-affect-how-your-brain-reacts-to-food-new-research-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Feeling-lonely-It-may-affect-how-your-brain-reacts-to-food-new-research-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b045b1e2-8c05-4c5a-9c3e-a25b5e0d4497 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 05:36:00 -0400 Feeling lonely? It may affect how your brain reacts to food, new research suggests
CD20 x CD3 双特异性抗体的治疗潜力2024 年 3 月 25 日星期一，由于对正在进行的验证性试验进展的担忧，美国 FDA 拒绝批准 Regeneron 的 Odronextamab 治疗两种类型的淋巴瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Therapeutic-pottial-of-CD20-x-CD3-bispecific-antibodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Therapeutic-pottial-of-CD20-x-CD3-bispecific-antibodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bef6184-a855-49eb-8365-2938370481e7 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 01:24:00 -0400 Therapeutic potential of CD20 x CD3 bispecific antibodies
研究强调了拉丁美洲社区围产期妇女面临的 COVID-19 挑战在 COVID-19 大流行期间，公共政策阻止许多居住在美国的墨西哥裔家庭获得食品和心理保健等重要服务，尽管这些社区的感染率和死亡率最高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Study-highlights-COVID-19-challenges-for-perinatal-women-in-Latino-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Study-highlights-COVID-19-challenges-for-perinatal-women-in-Latino-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27694f91-4af1-4cdc-a4ec-1ebf74234509 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 00:00:00 -0400 Study highlights COVID-19 challenges for perinatal women in Latino communities
新型放射治疗系统对卵巢癌的无创检测和治疗根据《核医学杂志》四月号上发表的新研究，一种新的放射治疗系统能够无创地检测和治疗卵巢癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Non-guarantee-detection-and-treatment-of-ovarian-cancer-with-new-radiotheranostic-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Non-guarantee-detection-and-treatment-of-ovarian-cancer-with-new-radiotheranostic-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=040e50ff-7439-4937-b9c2-351cde04caac Thu, 04 Apr 2024 23:49:27 -0400 Non-invasive detection and treatment of ovarian cancer with new radiotheranostic system
研究表明，哮喘发作不仅会导致炎症，还会造成气道损伤研究人员报告说，在哮喘中，支气管周围的肌肉收紧会挤压和破坏上皮细胞，从而导致气道受损，从而促进气道炎症和粘液产生，这通常与哮喘发作有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Asthma-attacks-cause-airway-damage-beyond-inflammation-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240404/Asthma-attacks-cause-airway-damage-beyond-inflammation-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66ea57eb-aa6e-44db-8352-00366cd0448c Thu, 04 Apr 2024 23:44:41 -0400 Asthma attacks cause airway damage beyond inflammation, research shows
